Items.StringList: Enter in $/kW|Enter in $|Use Modeled Value ($)|Use Cost Breakdown ($)

Caption.String: The fixed annual operating cost on the Financial Parameters page is the sum of the Operations and Maintenance (O&M) costs on this page. On this page, enter itemized operations and maintenance costs in $ or $/kW, check Override Cost Structure to enter the total O&M cost as a single value, or choose Use Modeled Value to have SAM automatically calculate the O&M cost. The value in the 'Total operations and mainetance costs' box is used as the 'Fixed operating cost (annual) value in the Financial Parameters page. See Help for details.
